creator: pat.turner@mandoforms.com
text:
As raised in bug#3944 and signed off as fixed, but it is still there in the 
final release build of 3.3. 

To repeat the bug install the 3.3 binaries and request
http://your_machine_ip_or_name:8080/servlet/SnoopServlet.

On the first and second request all is fine. On the third and thereafter the 
address and host are given as 127.0.0.1/localhost.

As this is a release build, we would really appreciate 
a. A way of detecting that we are running on tomcat 3.3?
b. If this is so can we fix the problem with a workaround?

Many thanks
Pat Turner

original bug bug#3944:
http://www.mail-archive.com/tomcat-dev@jakarta.apache.org/msg16374.html

This is fixed in the nightly builds.
